description:
In this course you will learn photo manipulation techniques by creating a zombie. We will be using Adobe Photoshop in this photo manipulation course.

You can turn a photo into anything, but to make it look accurate and real, that takes some skill. With the popularity of the zombie genre in tv shows, movies and games, we have developed this course so that it will make learning photo manipulation fun.

In this fun and interactive course we will be creating a zombie as you learn the photo manipulation process in Photoshop and provide some tips in achieving the desired look.

After watching this course, you'll have the knowledge to do your own photo-manipulation projects for any type of project.
title: Learn Photo Manipulation in Adobe Photoshop
